Skill Notes:
Intelligence Language Bonus: +1 Language Count
Rogue Skills: Skill Trained (Stealth; Choose 8 from any)
Skill Increases: Skill Increase (Choose 2 from any)
Thief: Skill Trained (Thievery)
Charming Liar: Critical success on a Lie improves a target's attitude by 1 step once per conversation
Confabulator: Reduces the bonus given to targets of Deception for previous attempts to +2
Courtly Graces: Can use Society to impersonate a noble or to Make An Impression on one
Lengthy Diversion: Can remain hidden after a Create A Diversion attempt critically succeeds
Lie To Me: Can use Deception to detect lies in a conversation
Quick Disguise: Can create a disguise in 1 min
Slippery Secrets: Successful Deception vs. spell DC negates spell effects that read minds, detect lies, or reveal alignment
Combat
Hit Points: 35 Armor Class: 17 (dexterity; trained) Class DC: Rogue: 17 (dexterity; trained)
Armor: None Shield: None Weapons: Hand Crossbow (+7 1d6 P R60'; dexterity; trained); Scythe (+6 1d10+1 S [Crit +d10]; strength; trained); Staff (+6 1d4+1 B [2h d8]; strength; trained)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +3
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +2
Strength Attack Adjustment: +1
Thief: +1 damage with finesse melee weapons
Unconventional Weaponry (Rapier): Weapon Familiarity (Rapier)
Deny Advantage: Does not suffer flat-footed vs. hidden, undetected, flanking, or surprising foes of equal or lower level
Nimble Dodge: (R) Gives +2 Armor Class against an attack when unencumbered
Sneak Attack: Successful strike using an agile, finesse, or projectile weapon vs. a flat-footed foe inflicts +1d6 HP precision damage
Surprise Attack: Rolling Deception or Stealth for initiative inflicts off-guard vs. self on creatures that haven't acted
Unbalancing Blow: (1) Ends the turn with a two-handed melee Strike that inflicts 1 additional damage die, even on failure
Save: Fortitude: +6 (constitution; trained); Reflex: +9 (dexterity; expert); Will: +9 (wisdom; expert)
